tasks.task_description: Add 'Diagnose Connection Issues' menu item to server context menu
Create diagnostic agent function that analyzes server logs
Implement repository documentation fetching and analysis
Integrate the diagnostic agent into the tray menu system

description: Create MCP Server Diagnostic Agent - Add menu item to analyze server connection issues by checking logs, repository documentation, and configuration
context: Created comprehensive diagnostic agent with log analysis, repository documentation fetching, and configuration validation
Added diagnostic report display function with formatted output
Integrated diagnostic agent into tray menu system with context menu item and action handler
